items.sentence: It's been very hard to get anything done around here.
Tom stopped the train by pulling the emergency brake.
Let's not do anything that might get us into trouble.
I used to read detective stories before going to bed.
How did you know Tom was going to be able to do that?
I didn't know Tom was going to be in Boston all week.
I want to find a place to live close to where I work.
I want to know if you have any time to help me today.
I want to know what caused me to gain so much weight.
The operation was very serious, but Tom came through.
